title: Game is freezing only in fights
body: i have a great pc i have uninstalled league, ran a repair on the client, turned off game bar and UAC. i checked my hard drives for problems and my windows is up to date. Please someone help me with this, the freezing has cost me so many games

replies.body: It sounds like you've already run through a lot of the basic troubleshooting and in order to go much further we're probably going to need to take a look through some of your game logs to get a better idea of what's going wrong in your system. Reach out to our tech team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with those logs so they can take a closer look.
Same issue. I did all the troubleshooting and sent a ticket and uploaded logs. Only blitzcrank has responded thus far.
If Blitz isn't already getting a human agent for you, make sure to hit that big red button and submit a reply to be sure he fetches someone!
yeah this has started about 1 month ago and its tragic. it doesnt happen every game but when it does its tragic
